title: What pair of actors played the 'Odd Couple' better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tony Randall and Jack Klugman. I watched the show before I even knew there was a movie. So they are the odd couple to me. In The Days of Wine and Roses, Jack Lemmon (movie Felix) plays an alcoholic and Jack Klugman (tv Oscar) plays his A.A. sponsor. Also there was a 1975 cartoon version, The Oddball Couple, with Spiffy the cat and Fleabag the dog.

The 1968 version!! When fussy Felix (Jack Lemmon) becomes suicidal over his impending divorce, he accepts an offer to move in with his best friend, messy Oscar (Walter Matthau). Felix drives Oscar crazy with his obsession over his soon-to-be ex. Oscar tries to get him out of his funk by arranging a double date with two wacky British neighbors, Cecily (Monica Evans) and Gwendolyn (Carole Shelley). When the plan backfires and Felix grows even more despondent, his friendship with Oscar is put to the test.
